biotools.summary: Short Linear Motif discovery and molecular evolution is an open source suite of Python programs for sequence analysis, with a particular focus on the prediction and analysis of short linear motifs (SLiMs), which are are responsible for mediating domain-motif protein-protein interactions. It can be downloaded from GitHub, and some tools are available as REST servers.

bioschemas.name: SLiMSuite
